items.content_html: A lightweight web application designed to fetch and display MLB game schedules and video highlights for selected dates. This project combines asynchronous JavaScript, dynamic DOM manipulation, and responsive UI design to provide an interactive user experience.
items.title: JeffersonRoesler/MLB-Statistics-Viewer: A lightweight web application designed to fetch and display MLB game schedules and video highlights for selected dates. This project combines asynchronous JavaScript, dynamic DOM manipulation, and responsive UI design to provide an interactive user experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
items.title: leoneldonati/livio-web: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.

items.content_html: A lightweight Point of Sale (POS) system built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. This system allows you to manage customers and items without the need for a backend server. It is entirely in-memory, making it ideal for small-scale usage or testing.
items.title: yasith-chathuranga/react-in-memory-pos: A lightweight Point of Sale (POS) system built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. This system allows you to manage customers and items without the need for a backend server. It is entirely in-memory, making it ideal for small-scale usage or testing.

items.content_html: SpendWise is a lightweight and intuitive expense tracking application designed to help users manage their finances effectively. Built with a powerful full-stack architecture, it seamlessly integrates a user-friendly interface with robust backend functionalities to provide a smooth and secure experience.

Built with a powerful full-stack architecture, it seamlessly integrates a user-friendly interface with robust backend functionalities to provide a smooth and secure experience.
